cultural.name: Demilitarized Zone
cultural.description: Return all structure on this planet to your reinforcements. Then, return all ground forces on this planet to the space area. ATTACH: Units cannot be committed to, produced on or placed on this planet. During the agenda phase, this planet's planet card can be traded as part of a transaction.

cultural.name: Dyson Sphere
cultural.description: ATTACH: This planet's resource value is increased by 2 and its influence value is increased by 1.

cultural.name: Freelancers
cultural.description: You may produce 1 unit in this system; you may spend influence as if it were resources to produce this unit.

cultural.name: Gamme Wormhole
cultural.description: Place a gamma wormhole token in this system. Then, purge this card.

cultural.name: Mercenary Outfit
cultural.description: You may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on this planet.

cultural.name: Paradise World
cultural.description: ATTACH: This planet's influence value is increased by 2.

cultural.name: Tomb of Emphidia
cultural.description: ATTACH: This planet's influence value is increased by 1. If the player who has the 'Crown of Emphidia' Relic has control of this planet, they can use that relic to gain 1 Victory Point.

cultural.name: Cultural Relic Fragment
cultural.description: ACTION: Purge 3 of your cultural relic fragments to gain 1 Relic.

hazardous.name: Core Mine
hazardous.description: If you have at least 1 mech on this planet, or if you remove 1 infantry form this planet, gain 1 trade good.

hazardous.name: Expedition
hazardous.description: If oyu have at least 1 mech on this planet, or if you remove 1 infantry from this , ready this planet.

hazardous.name: Lazax Survivors
hazardous.description: ATTACH: This planet's resource value is increased by 1 and its influence value is increased by 2.

hazardous.name: Mining World
hazardous.description: ATTACH: This planet's resource value is increased by 2.

hazardous.name: Rich World
hazardous.description: ATTACH: This planet's resource value is increased by 1.

hazardous.name: Volatile Fuel Source
hazardous.description: If you have at least 1 mech on this planet, or if you remove 1 infantry form this planet, gain 1 command token.

hazardous.name: Warfare Research Facility
hazardous.description: ATTACH: This planet has a red technology specialty; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

hazardous.name: Hazardous Relic Fragment
hazardous.description: ACTION: Purge 3 of your hazardous relic fragments to gain 1 Relic.

industrial.name: Abandoned Warehouses
industrial.description: You may gain 2 commodities, or you may convert up to 2 of your commodities to trade goods.

industrial.name: Biotic Research Facility
industrial.description: ATTACH: This planet has a green technology specialty; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

industrial.name: Cybernetic Research Facility
industrial.description: ATTACH: This planet has a yellow technology specialty; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

industrial.name: Funcitoning Base
industrial.description: You may gian 1 commodity, or you may spend 1 trade good or 1 commodity to draw 1 action card.

industrial.name: Local Fabricators
industrial.description: You may gian 1 commodity, or you may spend 1 trade good or 1 commodity to place 1 mech from your reinforcements on this planet.

industrial.name: Propulsion Research Facility
industrial.description: ATTACH: This planet has a blue technology specialty; if this planet already has a technology specialty, this planet's resource and influence values are each increased by 1 instead.

industrial.name: Industrial Relic Fragment
industrial.description: ACTION: Purge 3 of your industrial relic fragments to gain 1 Relic.

frontier.name: Enigmatic Device
frontier.description: Place this card face up in your play area. ACTIONL You may spend 6 resources and purge this card to research 1 technology.

frontier.name: Gamma Relay
frontier.description: Place a gamma wormhole token in this system. Then, purge this card.

frontier.name: Ion Storm
frontier.description: Place the ion storm token in this system with either side face up. Then, place this card in the common play area. At the end of a 'Move Ships' or 'Retreat' sub-step of a tactical action during which 1 or more of your ships use the ion storm wormhole, flip the ion storm token to its opposing side.

frontier.name: Merchant Station
frontier.description: You may replenish your commodities, or you may convert your commodities to trade goods.

frontier.name: Mirage
frontier.description: Place the Mirage planet token in this system. Gain the Mirage planet card and ready it. Then, purge this card.

frontier.name: Unknown Relic Fragment
frontier.description: This card counts as a relic fragment of any type.

frontier.name: Entropic Field
frontier.description: Gain 1 command token and 2 trade goods.

frontier.name: Major Entropic Field
frontier.description: Gain 1 command token and 3 trade goods.

frontier.name: Minor Entropic Field
frontier.description: Gain 1 command token and 1 trade good.
